channel.title: [317]Spades-Scape [Loading 317 Cache]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/627/spadeslogogif.gif[/img]
Welcome to Spades-Scape!
This is not a "Remake" of RuneScape, it was simply made to be a clean up of a crappy source. It was originally DeltaScape, but I downloaded it from a source that was far from the original Delta. Here is a link: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=408458.0]Fernanscape[/url]
As you can tell I did extensive work to clean this up. No, I did not keep the crappy "Blurrs" client. I hated that client from day 1. I actually started working on this source around December 2009. I did host it for awhile, but took it down. I had it running but decided I didn't like keeping up with all the staff and stuff. Anyways, I basically at first went around and fixed as many dupes I could possibly find, I think in the end I fixed about 10 or so dupes, I'm sure there are more out there I just haven't been able to find them. I took away the traditional "home", "training area", "skill area", ect, ect... What I did was I tried to base everything at first off of RuneScape, I made all the teleports teleport to the correct locations, with the correct NPC's in places where I tried to work on. I tried to clean up the shops as much as I could.
What have I done to this source? Well, there are a number of things I actually did to this source. Removed all the Npc's and re-spawned them all. Cleaned out the item.cfg file which wasn't really a task to begin with, but I got it done. Fixed numerous bugs, including the one from my last source whilst dying your character was stuck, I was able to fix that problem. Added a Random Event to my source, pretty simple but if you plan on hosting this source, it can be very effective in finding the botters. Reduced the Combat delay by a little bit, I was never able to get it completely gone. Added a sound support system to my server. Added a music system to my server. Server is playable with a 317 client loading the original 317 deob Added NPC Clipping These are not counting what I have in my last version.
Client Adds: Complete cache reading HeadIcons Complete Sounds Cache Reading Complete Music Cache Reading No Models No Sprites, Just the background is changed. [b]I DID NOT DISABLE THE CHAT FILTER[/b] While loading the client it plays the traditional RuneScape theme music then turns off when logging on. I commented out the music because there was [b]minor[/b] bugs with it and I didn't want to mess too much with it.
Features: None really, it is pretty much just Delta with all the special stuff removed. I started working on a mini-game I had found on R-S but I never finished it. I did make an extremely simple one in the rouges den, but that's about all. I do have a very basic Tutorial Island, I disabled it on login because it was just a test. I enabled Tele-Other on the server with the correct teleports.
This source is [b]NOT[/b] done, I don't have time to continue with it. I am much more busy with things IRL, I did not do a super great job with it, whenever I see good bases get released people don't use them because they are complicated. This is just a WinterLove source, people can easily find tutorials, add, or make things themselves. This is going to be a good starting base for people who would want to continue on with RSPS. The clients are clean and very easy to use, you can go ahead and smash them full of your customs. This is meant to be a clean start for people. I understand a lot of people don't like Delta, but I'd rather use this then PI.
Here are some pictures: [img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/3493/spadesscape.png[/img] [img]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/3159/spadesscapefighting.png[/img] [img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/1887/updatetimer.png[/img] [img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/1031/spadesscape317377.png[/img] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/577/spadesclient.png[/img] [img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/214/spadesscape1.png[/img] [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/6286/spadesscape2.png[/img] [img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/9467/spadesscape3.png[/img] [img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/2949/spadesscape6.png[/img] [img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/8227/317random.png[/img]
Download Links
Client 317: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=SXYRGADO http://uppit.com/hys4ir6rxg3t/317_loading_317.rar
Client 377: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=4ZFCW8NK http://uppit.com/vy5045sde37q/317_loading_377.rar
Server: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WXIJN7KC http://uppit.com/9zqseu697bzl/Spades-Scape.rar
[/center]

item.title: [317]Spades-Scape [Loading 317 Cache]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Like downloaders of this source will have seen, only admin and moderators have a crown displayed in chat.
To fix this so the owner has a crown to
first search for this:

if (playerRights == 2)
                                        out.write(2);
                                        else
                                out.write(playerRights);
                                out.write(0);
                                updateRequired = true;
                                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

so obviously

out.write(0);

is the crown, and since it was only set for admin rights you simply have to add owner to it.

if (playerRights == 2 || playerRights == 3)

Thats it, owner crown fixed

Read full topic

item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:51, topic:415634”][quote author=Vexillum link=topic=517553.msg3897378#msg3897378 date=1327436299]

every single server ima downloading i check its possible to dupe and it is… i used cheat engine and it worked… soz deleting this server from desk

lol are you serious, I’m working for so long now on a server based from spades-scape
any way to fix it?

Duh there are tutorials to fix cheat engine and many others. I’m pretty sure the cheat engine fix is just a simple code in ShopHandler.
[/quote]

I tested it myself,
and It’s just like you can do in real rs,
it displays like that but when trading or replacing the slot it goes back to the normal value.
So I wouldn’t bother about it, or do I? :p[/quote]

I wouldn’t think so :P. Leave the dupers thinking they found out how to dupe and then they’ll see its fake :).

Read full topic
